casebody.data:
In the Matter of GLOBAL COMPANIES LLC, Appellant,
v.
NEW YORK STATE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION, et al., Respondents, Charlene Benton, etc., et al., Intevenors-Respondents, (And Another Related Proceeding.) Motion No: 2017-1196 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on February 20, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
